file_content.text: Stop this nonsense at once! What do you think you're doing, blasting my droids? I'm a senior administrator of Czerka Corporation.
You're a hard man to get a hold of, Black Death.
That's not what I heard.
"Black Death"? What are you talking about?
What exactly is a senior Czerka official doing on Hutta?
Czerka? Fascinating.
I don't answer to you, alien scum!
I'm on vacation, not that it's any of your business.
Stick that attitude in a black hole and shut up.
Listen to me, scum.
How dare you speak to me like that, you grotesque thing!
I most certainly will not. How dare a cheap thug like you speak to me in such a tone.
You could be the Queen of Naboo for all I care.
I'm not impressed.
I've had all I'm going to take from you rabble.
Your parents obviously didn't teach you to respect your betters, little girl.
Watch your tone, little boy. I'm an important man.
I demand to know why you're disturbing my hunting trip!
You've been slaughtering the Evocii.
You're killing natives.
Those animals? You're some nature conservationist, you've come to the wrong planet.
You have a sick fascination with collecting the natives' ears.
It's about your "hobby."
I always take trophies from my kills--it's half the joy. I have gundark ears and rancor tusks, too.
If you don't quit killing the natives, you'll answer to me.
Stop hunting Evocii, or else.
You insignificant scum. Do you know how important I am? I dine with Imperial Moffs!
We both know Evocii are no better than akk dogs. So stop pretending this is about them.
Look, I understand how things work here on Hutta. I'll pay you handsomely to leave me in peace.
You've got a deal. I couldn't care less about the Evocii.
Works for me. [Take bribe]
You rabble. Always grasping for a few extra credits, aren't you? Here, take them.
Do not disturb my holiday again, understand?
You're not buying your way out of this.
Stuff your credits.
Oh, for the love of... what do you want from me? Stop wasting my time and name it!
I want you dead, you sick filth.
Your head. [Kill him]
How... how dare you....
The Hutt considers the Evocii his personal property--and you're poaching them.
Nem'ro is angry.
What? I... I had no idea. If my leisure pursuits have offended mighty Nem'ro, I'm truly sorry.
I will cease my holiday immediately and pack up my camp site at once. Please give Nem'ro my apologies.
Take the hint, you stupid gasbag. Otherwise, you're dead.
Want to die? [Hurt him]
You're... fortunate there are so many of you. Otherwise... I'd....
Aah! That... that hurts more than anything I've ever....
Very well... you win. I was growing bored with the hunt anyway....
